an5.144:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakete viharati tikandakivane.
an5.144:2.1: “Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam appatikule patikulasanni vihareyya.
an5.144:2.2: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam patikule appatikulasanni vihareyya.
an5.144:2.3: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam appatikule ca patikule ca patikulasanni vihareyya.
an5.144:2.4: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam patikule ca appatikule ca appatikulasanni vihareyya.
an5.144:2.5: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam patikulanca appatikulanca tadubhayam abhinivajjetva upekkhako vihareyya sato sampajano.
an5.144:3.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca appatikule patikulasanni vihareyya?
an5.144:3.3: idam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca appatikule patikulasanni vihareyya.
an5.144:4.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca patikule appatikulasanni vihareyya?
an5.144:4.3: idam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca patikule appatikulasanni vihareyya.
an5.144:5.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca appatikule ca patikule ca patikulasanni vihareyya?
an5.144:5.2: ‘Ma me rajaniyesu dhammesu rago udapadi, ma me dosaniyesu dhammesu doso udapadi’ti—
an5.144:5.3: idam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca appatikule ca patikule ca patikulasanni vihareyya.
an5.144:6.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca patikule ca appatikule ca appatikulasanni vihareyya?
an5.144:6.2: ‘Ma me dosaniyesu dhammesu doso udapadi, ma me rajaniyesu dhammesu rago udapadi’ti—
an5.144:6.3: idam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca patikule ca appatikule ca appatikulasanni vihareyya.
an5.144:7.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca patikulanca appatikulanca tadubhayam abhinivajjetva upekkhako vihareyya?
an5.144:7.2: ‘Sato sampajano ma me kvacani katthaci kincanam rajaniyesu dhammesu rago udapadi, ma me kvacani katthaci kincanam dosaniyesu dhammesu doso udapadi, ma me kvacani katthaci kincanam mohaniyesu dhammesu moho udapadi’ti—
an5.144:7.3: idam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca patikulanca appatikulanca tadubhayam abhinivajjetva upekkhako vihareyya sato sampajano”ti.
